DOC.brief_summary: An investigation relative effectiveness thermal-aided muscle stimulation vs. body temperature muscle stimulation elicit muscle contraction quadriceps
DOC.criteria: Subject meet exclusion criterion Age < 18 year Subject pregnant Subject implant pacemaker/defibrillator Subject diagnose epilepsy Subject implant metallic femoral rod Subject chair bedbound Subject neuromuscular disease abnormality Subject BMI > 45 Evidence disease condition , opinion investigator , may compromise conduct result study
